metadata.title: CVE-2012-2394

platform: SLE SDK 10 SP4 for IBM iSeries and IBM pSeries
SLE SDK 10 SP4 for IBM zSeries
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for IBM POWER
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for IBM zSeries 64bit
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for IPF
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 10 SP4 for x86
SUSE Linux Enterprise Teradata 10 SP3 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T

metadata.description: Wireshark 1.4.x before 1.4.13 and 1.6.x before 1.6.8 on the SPARC and Itanium platforms does not properly perform data alignment for a certain structure member, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a (1) ICMP or (2) ICMPv6 Echo Request packet.
